name: Candy Bomber Blast
description:
Let's play amazing Candy Bomber Blast puzzle game.

How To Play?
=========
- See top of the Candy bomb and tap on same candy bombe on play area.
- Player is require to tap on every same as top candy bomb and create your score.
- If you wrong tap then your score is minus.
- You need to play till the end of time.
- End of time you see your score result.

Features:
=======
- There are four different levels like easy, medium, hard and very hard.
- Colourful graphics.
- Easy to play.
- Increase your concentration skill.
- Supported IOS11.

So are you ready for play? Download Now...
